alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 2:08AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 6 to 12 inches for Highway 12 and 200 along the divide, with 3 to 7 inches elsewhere. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph near the Divide. * WHERE...Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Georgetown Lake, MacDonald Pass, Butte, and Homestake Pass. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times Helmville to Highway 12 and MacDonald Pass. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
